programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E38
programme.desc: Ninoska le ha preparado una sopa a Carlos Ral, la mujer aprovecha la receptividad de Perroni para decirle que Adriana estaba en el cumpleaos dedicada por completo a Cesar.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E001
programme.desc: Victoria Guanipa, asegura ante Genara que es la duea y seora de Catarrana. Hilario Guanipa ordena a sus peones derribar la alambrada que delimita su hacienda porque midieron mal los linderos. Victoria le da alcance al caballo donde va Pablo y lo detiene la pareja se simpatiza de inmediato, el se presenta como Pablo Martnez. Pablo advierte a Felipe que nadie debe saber que el es realmente Nicols Del Casal.

programme.title: La Trepadora - S01:E002
programme.desc: Victoria que est desnuda explica a Pablo (Nicols) por que se quedo sin ropa; el joven le da su camisa para que pueda salir del ro. Hilario aprovecha cualquier oportunidad para galantear a Florencia. Por ordenes de Hilario, Zambrano a compaa a Pablo y Felipe en la cacera, pues debe vigilarlos. Victoria reta a Pablo a demostrar su puntera; el quiere como premio un beso de ella. Rosendo asegura a Florencia que a Hilario Guanipa a veces es mejor tenerlo lejos.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E21
programme.desc: Julia huye para defenderse de Marcos, pide auxilio y llama a Max. Ezequiel, armado, llega a la casa abandonada y se enfrenta a Marcos. Discuten, Marcos pierde la cabeza y es Ezequiel quien dispara para luego decir que fue un suicidio. Dolor en casa de los Aragon y Fausto juro que tomar justicia.

programme.title: Piel Salvaje - S01:E22
programme.desc: Camila recibe una nota de El Doliente que le aconseja que no siga buscando a su mam. Esto la preocupa y as lo comenta a Max. Tambien le pide que confe en ella, pero el est cansado de sus desplantes. Todos intuyen que fue Ezequiel quien mato a Marcos.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E40
programme.desc: Pastora conversa con Elisenda sobre Cirilo, cuando se percata que el monitor cardaco conectado a Ral anuncia que el joven sufre una crisis.

programme.title: El Desprecio - S01:E41
programme.desc: Clara Ines y Bernice tratan de interceder a favor de Manuel frente a Israel, pero el seor insiste en que el joven debe irse de la mansion.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E40
programme.desc: Claudio receives a call from Pedro warning him to get ready, because Guillermo has been arrested and there is always the possibility that he will end up confessing. Alfonso and Malena are not willing to play Pablos game. Alberto and Guillermo face to face again, they look at each other with hatred, each one with his own reasons; the whole truth seems to be about to be discovered.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E41
programme.desc: Patricia is not intimidated by Gertrudis, she is ready to make Pablo pay for the physical and psychological violence he exerts on his wife; the lady threatens him fiercely to abandon Malenas defense, while Pablo shows himself triumphant - Guillermo is taken to his cell, when one of the inmates hands him a note with his death sentence: the fish dies by the mouth.

programme.title: Te Tengo en Salsa - S01:E37
programme.desc: Derrotado ante las palabras de Adriana, Carlos Ral le dice a su hermano que, con su actitud logro que la joven Palacios no quiera saber nada de ellos.

programme.title: Corazon Traicionado - S01:E41
programme.desc: Patricia is not intimidated by Gertrudis, she is ready to make Pablo pay for the physical and psychological violence he exerts on his wife; the lady threatens him fiercely to abandon Malenas defense, while Pablo shows himself triumphant - Guillermo is taken to his cell, when one of the inmates hands him a note with his death sentence: the fish dies by the mouth.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E01 - Volcanoes
programme.desc: The Greatest Show on Earth is also the most ferocious. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of volcanoes and examines the eruptions in Montserrat which devastated half a Caribbean Island, the 1973 eruption on the Icelandic island of Heimaey, the 2010 eruption Eyjafjallajokull which blocked air travel in Europe, the Merapi eruption in Indonesia, and Mount Nyiragongo in Congo, and the super-volcano in Yellowstone.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E02 - Earthquake
programme.desc: When the Earth really moves, it means disaster on an epic scale. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of earthquakes and looks at the 2015 Kathmandu earthquake in Nepal, the 2008 Sichuan earthquake in China where an estimated 10,000 children were trapped in collapsed school buildings, a 1960 Puerto Mont earthquake in Chile, the 2010 Port-au-Princ earthquake in Haiti, and the 2005 Kashmir earthquake in Pakistan.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E03 - Epidemic
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at major epidemics including the African Ebola outbreak in Sudan which eventually led to cases in the United State and England, the Indian Smallpox outbreak in Bihar, the African Cholera outbreak, the SARS outbreak in Guanghzhou China, and the Bird Flu of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E04 - Wind
programme.desc: Desperate Hours looks at the destructive power of wind. From the devastating power of Hurricane Katrina in New Orleans to the destructive Cyclone Nargis in Myanmar, the 1960 storm Hurricane Donna in Florida, Tornado Joplin in Missouri, and Hurricane Sandy in New York.

programme.title: Desperate Hours - S01:E05 - Fire
programme.desc: The blazing terror of a fire can match anything in creation for sheer menace. Desperate Hours looks at the destructive force of fires including the Black Saturday Bushfires in Victoria Australia, the Station Nightclub fire in Rhode Island, the LInnovation Department Store fire in Brussels Belgium, the Armoury fire in Lagos Nigeria, and the Binhai New Development Zone Fire in Tianjin China.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E07 - Iraqi Sniper Attack
programme.desc: On deployment in Anbar Province, Marine Corp Master Sergeant Buck Doyle throws himself in harms way to save a fallen comrade from an Iraqi sniper and becomes a target himself.

programme.title: Fight to Survive - S03:E08 - Lightning Strike
programme.desc: A bass fishing trip goes horribly wrong when a bolt of lightning strikes their boat, leaving Seventeen-year-old Christian Neal burned and unconscious and his father Gabe blown into the water and paralyzed. It will take a miracle to save them.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E27 - Diana And Sarah The Royal Wives Of Windsor Part 1
programme.desc: As royal wives, both Diana and Fergie experienced a life filled with loneliness and sadness, despite their high hopes of bringing change to the House of Windsor. What was supposed to be their fairy-tale lives ended up being far from that reality.

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E03 - Operation Waterfall
programme.desc: Snow in Montana makes the water dangerous, but the yearly boat float goes on. Watch Montana Game Wardens as they check the rivers to keep boaters safe and following the rules.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E05 - Saddle Sores
programme.desc: The guys are feeling great as they leave sheep territory, but the 22-hour trip to Tom-Tom, the first moose camp, feels endless. Itll take them two long days of riding to get there. As they head into moose land with a successful sheep packed up high, trouble always seems just around the corner on their journey. After riding for eight hours, issues start cropping up.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E04 - Naturally Exotic
programme.desc: This Episode of Miracles of Nature takes you on a journey from the Antigua in the Caribbean to the favourite of climbers - the Blue Mountains of New South Wales, Australia and then back to the Caribbean to admore in the beauty of The British Virgin Islands with stunning white beaches and turquoise waters.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E05 - Naturally Fierce
programme.desc: Visit the wintry North Pole from the comfort of your settee as this episode takes us on a journey to the icy Artic and then to Quebec to watch the most southernly fjord set at low tide, before journeying on to Alberta to take in the magnitude of the Sasquachuan River as it makes its way through the Rocky Mountains.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E07 - Uga Bay, Sri Lanka and Istanbul
programme.desc: The Luxury Travel Show heads to the idyllic resort of Uga Beach in Sri Lanka for some unusual fine dining locations, with tall tables in the swimming pool and dug-out sunken tables in the sand. Then its off to Istanbul with a stay in one of the citys best hotels - which has been transformed from a derelict tobacco factory into a palace fit for royalty.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E08 - Grand Cayman and Toledo
programme.desc: Things hot up in this episode of The Luxury Travel Show as we head to the Caribbean island of Grand Cayman to a small town where visitors can literally send loved ones a postcard from Hell. The temperature dips only slightly in Toledo for a safari trip in Spain, with sunset drives, horse riding and clay pigeon shooting.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E09 - Darkness
programme.desc: Pakistan/Texas Pt2. Jim continues his hunt through extremely dangerous but also beautiful areas of Pakistan.

programme.title: Diana: In Search of Happiness
programme.desc: Experience an in-depth look at Princess Diana, the extraordinary woman of the 20th century. Featuring unique interviews and touching clips, this portrait captures her incredible journey to fame and her ability to overcome the emotional and physical challenges she encountered nearly every day.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E28 - Diana And Sarah The Royal Wives Of Windsor Part 2
programme.desc: Diana, Princess of Wales, and Sarah, Duchess of York both married into the Queens family, leaving in the midst of scandals, though their exits were quite different. Sadly, Diana passed away, while Sarah survived to start anew. Over time, their struggles can be better understood, and this documentary explores those challenges...

programme.title: Wardens - S02:E04 - Operation Snow Cat
programme.desc: Montana Game Wardens ride snowmobiles through the mountains in winter. Its elk hunting season, so they also make sure everyone is following the hunting rules.

programme.title: Dropped - S02:E06 - Church on the Mountain
programme.desc: In the Yukon, decisions can change everything in a heartbeat, especially in such a tough landscape. The brothers are closing in on the enormous mountain grizzly, now just 500 yards away, and its up to Chris to make the call.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E06 - Naturally Forged
programme.desc: In this episode of Miracles of Nature visits several different islands. Expect to see the breathtaking terrace rocks of Taiwan and the majestic volcano on the mythic island of Bali. On to the island of Jersey, after which a part of New York is named, and finally we visit the spectacular Madeira, which features an amazing variety of landscapes despite being a few kilometres in length.

programme.title: Miracles of Nature - S01:E07 - Naturally Majestic
programme.desc: Follow in the footsteps of Indiana Jones. In this episode of Miracles of Nature we visit the wonders of the Gobi Desert which is one of the oldest deserts in the world, and then the contrasting lush, green hillsides of northern Mongolian. From there we travel 5000 kilometres to the south east to Jordan and the Dead Sea.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E09 - Rennes and Provo
programme.desc: This gastronomic tour of Brittany stops off for crepes in Rennes and Oysters in Cancale before visiting the historic walled city of St Malo. Then on to the island of Providenciales, known locally as Provo, in the Turks and Caicos Caribbean islands with buggy racing on the beach and a spot of shopping for some very expensive wines.

programme.title: The Luxury Travel Show - S01:E10 - Stockholm and Lisbon
programme.desc: For a weekend winter break, Stockholm has got to be one of most beautiful cities to visit. Made up of 14 separate islands, its one of the best-preserved and largest mediaeval cities in Europe. Then some summer sun in the Portuguese capitol, Lisbon, for a whistle stop cultural tour of the city and a surfing lesson along the coast.

programme.title: Jim Shockeys Uncharted - S01:E10 - The Ancient Ones
programme.desc: Arctic. Jim and Coreys Arctic adventure starts with Muskox, an animal practically forgotten since pre-historic times in the Arctic.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E32 - Prince William Royal Teenage Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: Whos the real person beneath all those glamorous royal photos? This intriguing documentary takes a look into the life of the young man behind the public image.

programme.title: Royal Documentaries - S01:E28 - Diana And Sarah The Royal Wives Of Windsor Part 2

programme.title: Modeled with Love
programme.desc: When model-maker Olivias dad is set to retire from their firm, she believes shes the obvious pick to take over. Enter Simon, whose big picture thinking threatens to upend Olivias comfortable bubble along with her role as successor.

programme.title: Falling for the Competition
programme.desc: Molly runs the local moms group and this year theyre entering the prestigious Modern Parenting Group of the Year Contest. When a new to town dad, Ashley, sets up a rival dads group, their competitive natures cause competition in town.

programme.title: Three Dates to Forever
programme.desc: Maddie Mckenzie is a hard-working presenter whose drive and talent has made her a popular radio host. John Reed is a carefree tech entrepreneur whos more interested in hosting parties. The two couldnt be more different.

programme.title: The Soulmate Search
programme.desc: When Lindsay gets the chance to sign up to the notoriously exclusive dating service Eternity, she clashes with Will, her first date. They mutually agree this dating service has been a complete bust and make a deal to get their money back.

programme.title: Sorority Secrets
programme.desc: Cassie is thrilled when shes accepted as a mid-year transfer into an elite sorority, complete with free housing, tuition assistance and a great alumni network. However, when Cassie uncovers that the chapter president and advisor are running an escort service with girls from the sorority she realizes this little secret just might kill her

programme.title: Killer Cover Up
programme.desc: All-star soccer player Jenna Sims and her mom Sally are ready for a new start when they move to a new, sunny beach town. But when other members of her new soccer team start turning up dead and one ends up in a coma, Jenna finds herself accused of the crime.

programme.title: Against the Odds - S01:E20 - Diego Maradona, Bobby Charlton
programme.desc: On this episode of Against the Odds we salute two contrasting footballing legends. First there is the volatile and controversial Argentinian superstar Diego Maradona, then the statesmanlike Bobby Charlton. Two World Cup winners, two very different stories.

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E47 - 17 September 2025
programme.desc: FIBA EuroBasket wrapped up with an exciting finish, while the WNBA defending champs had a dramatic season opener.

programme.title: FIBA World Basketball - S01:E56 - Kristaps Porzingis glanzt fur Lettland und tritt den Atlanta Hawks bei
programme.desc: After starring for Latvia at FIBA EuroBasket, Kristaps Porzingis is part of an Atlanta Hawks team aiming high. This and more incredible stories in todays episode!

programme.desc: The Road to Del Mar begins with the first key prep races of the season. Rising stars and proven talents make their opening statements in the chase for a Breeders Cup berth.

programme.title: Melbourne Cup 2025 - S03:E02 - Hohepunkte des Melbourne Cups 2025
programme.desc: Relive the most thrilling moments of the 2025 Melbourne Cup the race that stops a nation. From the electric atmosphere at Flemington to the dramatic dash down the final straight, this highlight special captures the emotion, intensity, and glory of Australias greatest horse racing event. Experience every decisive move, celebration, and surprise from this unforgettable edition of the Cup.

programme.title: The Football Review - S05:E88 - Weltmeisterschaftsqualifikation
programme.desc: Norway, Scotland and Austria have all qualified for the World Cup for the first time since 1998, ending decades of hurt to finally return to footballs pinnacle event.
